## RSSfileManager class

A utility class to manage RSS related files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RSSfileManager 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[createFile(folderPath, basename, templateName, data, postProcess)](./rss-tracker.rssfilemanager.createfile.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Create a file from an RSS template.

If a file with the same basename already exists in the given folder location, a new unique basename is generated.

‚ùóThe mustache token `{{fileName}}` is automatically added to the data object. This token maps to the unique basename of the generated file (no file extension) and can be used to create wiki-links.


</td></tr>
